mapper.select: SELECT p1.property_value_name AS version_name, count(*) AS bug_num, IFNULL( sum(IF(p0.status_id = 5, 1, 0)), 0 ) AS bug_fix_num FROM defect_details AS p0 LEFT JOIN mtf_project_database_10.property_value_list AS p1 ON p0.find_version_id = p1.property_value_id LEFT JOIN user_information AS p2 ON p0.find_version_id = p2.current_production_version_id WHERE p2.telephone = #{telephone}

SELECT p0.ID AS ID, p0.TITLE AS TITLE, p0.TOP_FLAG AS TOP_FLAG, p1.PROPERTY_VALUE_NAME AS VERSION_NAME, p2.ID AS MAIN_FLAG FROM defect_details AS p0 LEFT JOIN mtf_project_database_10.property_value_list AS p1 ON p0.FIND_VERSION_ID = p1.PROPERTY_VALUE_ID LEFT JOIN main_version AS p2 ON p0.FIND_VERSION_ID = p2.MAIN_VERSION_ID WHERE NOT ISNULL(p2.ID) and NOT ISNULL(p0.TOP_FLAG) ORDER BY p2.ID ASC, p0.TOP_FLAG ASC;

SELECT bug.ID AS ID, IF(bug.ANONYMOUS_FLAG = 2, "匿名", person.USER_NAME) AS USER_NAME, cmp.COMPANY_NAME AS COMPANY_NAME, bug.TITLE, bug.DEFECT_DESCRIPTION, bug.EXPECT_DESCRIPTION, bug.SOLUTION_DESCRIPTION, ver.PROPERTY_VALUE_NAME AS VERSION_NAME, sts.PROPERTY_VALUE_NAME AS STATUS_NAME FROM defect_details AS bug LEFT JOIN user_information AS person ON bug.TELEPHONE = person.TELEPHONE LEFT JOIN company AS cmp ON person.COMPANY_ID = cmp.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN mtf_project_database_10.property_value_list AS ver ON bug.FIND_VERSION_ID = ver.PROPERTY_VALUE_ID LEFT JOIN mtf_project_database_10.property_value_list AS sts ON bug.STATUS_ID = sts.PROPERTY_VALUE_ID ORDER BY ID DESC
